name: Throne Rushers
description: Throne Rushers is an action/platform 2D game where the goal is to reach the throne on the top of the map in first. If you die, you begin again at the beginning of the map !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 6.1 Storage: 50 MB available space
